text: Adubu nakhoina yeknabasingbu nungsiyu, makhoida aphaba toubiyu, aduga singlakpagi wakhal amuk toudana makhoida puthok-u. Adu oirabadi nakhoigi mana chaogani, aduga nakhoina wangthoiraba Tengban Mapugi asengba machasing oigani. Maramdi toubimal khangdabasing amasung phattabasinggi maphamdasu mahakti chanbi hei.
